caption.p: Growth performance of DoUGP overexpression (OE3) plants. Protocorms (A) and seedlings (B) were imaged when they were cultivated on MS medium for 3, 30, and 60 days, respectively. For weight (C) measurement, during 60 days, weight increment of protocorms from three independent culture flasks were investigated. For height (D) measurement, seedlings from three independent culture flasks were investigated after 60 days. Results are presented as mean Â± standard error calculated from three biological replicates. Asterisks indicate statistically significant differences.
